item.title: 9 Excellent Big Games From 2025 That You Might’ve Missed
item.description: Some of 2025's finest games may have passed you by. Here's a guide to nine that could've dropped off your list, but you really should try out.

item.title: Europe’s EV Monopoly Requires Cheaper, Smaller Mass Market Vehicles
item.description: Europe's plan for an EV monopoly requires tiny electric cars to create a mass market and that means concessions on safety, comfort and style.

item.title: China Drafts New Laws Covering AI And Mental Health That Spurs International Interest
item.description: China has proposed a new set of AI laws. I examine portions pertaining to human mental health. Some intriguing aspects arise. An AI Insider scoop.
